# Syllabus, Resources, and References {#logistics}

This upfront section contains resources for use in **EA 078 PZ: Environmental Data Visualization**!

* The Syllabus provides an overview of course expectations and outcomes
* The Tools section provides guides for installation of R, RStudio, and R packages used in this course
* The Resources section will provide any other resources useful for this course.  It will include zoom links, web links, and Pitzer College resources 
* The References section will provide citations for course reading materials
